title.rendered: A Message Regarding SSHS Hoax Call

content.rendered:
Today (March 30), the Saratoga Springs City Police Department received a fake swatting call about an incident occurring at SSHS. Swatting is a term used to describe a hoax robocall to report a fake crime to emergency responders. This call was indicating that there was an event occurring at the high school. Several local school districts received similar calls this morning. Please know that our school is currently safe with no credible threats.
The district would like to thank our emergency responders for working with our high school to ensure the building was safe.
